verses.verse: וְיוֹסֵ֖ף <WH3130> And Joseph הוּרַ֣ד <WH3381> was brought down מִצְרָ֑יְמָה <WH4714> to Egypt וַיִּקְנֵ֡הוּ <WH7069> bought פּוֹטִיפַר֩ <WH6318> and Potiphar סְרִ֨יס <WH5631> an officer פַּרְעֹ֜ה <WH6547> of Pharaoh שַׂ֤ר <WH8269> captain הַטַּבָּחִים֙ <WH2876> of the guard אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> an מִצְרִ֔י <WH4713> Egyptian מִיַּד֙ <WH3027> him of the hands הַיִּשְׁמְעֵאלִ֔ים <WH3459> of the Ishmeelites אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who הוֹרִדֻ֖הוּ <WH3381> which had brought him down שָֽׁמָּה׃ <WH8033> there

וַיְהִ֤י <WH1961> became יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD אֶת־ <WH854> was with יוֹסֵ֔ף <WH3130> was with Joseph וַיְהִ֖י <WH1961> became אִ֣ישׁ <WH582> another מַצְלִ֑יחַ <WH6743> and he was a prosperous וַיְהִ֕י <WH1961> became בְּבֵ֥ית <WH1004> and he was in the house אֲדֹנָ֖יו <WH113> of his master הַמִּצְרִֽי׃ <WH4713> the Egyptian

וַיַּ֣רְא <WH7200> saw אֲדֹנָ֔יו <WH113> And his master כִּ֥י <WH3588> that יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> that the LORD אִתּ֑וֹ <WH854> caused וְכֹל֙ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after ה֣וּא <WH1931> he עֹשֶׂ֔ה <WH6213> made all that he did יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> [was] with him and that the LORD מַצְלִ֥יחַ <WH6743> to prosper בְּיָדֽוֹ׃ <WH3027> in his hand

וַיִּמְצָ֨א <WH4672> found יוֹסֵ֥ף <WH3130> And Joseph חֵ֛ן <WH2580> grace בְּעֵינָ֖יו <WH5869> in his sight וַיְשָׁ֣רֶת <WH8334> and he served אֹת֑וֹ <WH853> וַיַּפְקִדֵ֙הוּ֙ <WH6485> him and he made him overseer עַל־ <WH5921> over בֵּית֔וֹ <WH1004> over his house וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all יֶשׁ־ <WH3426> and all [that] he had ל֖וֹ נָתַ֥ן <WH5414> he put בְּיָדֽוֹ׃ <WH3027> into his hand

וַיְהִ֡י <WH1961> came מֵאָז֩ <WH227> And it came to pass from the time הִפְקִ֨יד <WH6485> [that] he had made him overseer אֹת֜וֹ <WH853> בְּבֵית֗וֹ <WH1004> in his house וְעַל֙ <WH5921> and over כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> he יֶשׁ־ <WH3426> and over all that he had ל֔וֹ וַיְבָ֧רֶךְ <WH1288> blessed יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> that the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> house הַמִּצְרִ֖י <WH4713> the Egyptian's בִּגְלַ֣ל <WH1558> sake יוֹסֵ֑ף <WH3130> for Joseph's וַיְהִ֞י <WH1961> came בִּרְכַּ֤ת <WH1293> and the blessing יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> he יֶשׁ־ <WH3426> was upon all that he had ל֔וֹ בַּבַּ֖יִת <WH1004> in the house וּבַשָּׂדֶֽה׃ <WH7704> and in the field

וַיַּעֲזֹ֣ב <WH5800> And he left כָּל־ <WH3605> everything אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which לוֹ֮ בְּיַד־ <WH3027> hand יוֹסֵף֒ <WH3130> all that he had in Joseph's וְלֹא־ <WH3808> did not יָדַ֤ע <WH3045> and he knew אִתּוֹ֙ <WH854> with מְא֔וּמָה <WH3972> not ought כִּ֥י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> he had save הַלֶּ֖חֶם <WH3899> the bread אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which ה֣וּא <WH1931> he אוֹכֵ֑ל <WH398> which he did eat וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> become יוֹסֵ֔ף <WH3130> And Joseph יְפֵה־ <WH3303> [person] and well תֹ֖אַר <WH8389> was [a] goodly וִיפֵ֥ה <WH3303> was handsome מַרְאֶֽה׃ <WH4758> favoured

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> came אַחַר֙ <WH310> And it came to pass after הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <WH1697> these things הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> these וַתִּשָּׂ֧א <WH5375> cast אֵֽשֶׁת־ <WH802> wife אֲדֹנָ֛יו <WH113> that his master's אֶת־ <WH853> עֵינֶ֖יהָ <WH5869> her eyes אֶל־ <WH413> at יוֹסֵ֑ף <WH3130> upon Joseph וַתֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> and she said שִׁכְבָ֥ה <WH7901> Lie עִמִּֽי׃ <WH5973> with

וַיְמָאֵ֓ן ׀ <WH3985> But he refused וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> and said אֶל־ <WH413> about אֵ֣שֶׁת <WH802> wife אֲדֹנָ֔יו <WH113> unto his master's הֵ֣ן <WH2005> Behold אֲדֹנִ֔י <WH113> Behold my master לֹא־ <WH3808> does not יָדַ֥ע <WH3045> wotteth אִתִּ֖י <WH854> with מַה־ <WH4100> anything בַּבָּ֑יִת <WH1004> not what [is] with me in the house וְכֹ֥ל <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> he יֶשׁ־ <WH3426> all that he hath ל֖וֹ נָתַ֥ן <WH5414> and he hath committed בְּיָדִֽי׃ <WH3027> to my hand

אֵינֶ֨נּוּ <WH369> There גָד֜וֹל <WH1419> [There is] none greater בַּבַּ֣יִת <WH1004> in this house הַזֶּה֮ <WH2088> this מִמֶּנִּי֒ <WH4480> than וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> than I neither חָשַׂ֤ךְ <WH2820> hath he kept back מִמֶּ֙נִּי֙ <WH4480> than מְא֔וּמָה <WH3972> any thing כִּ֥י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> lo אוֹתָ֖ךְ <WH853> בַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> from me but thee because אַתְּ־ <WH859> thou אִשְׁתּ֑וֹ <WH802> [art] his wife וְאֵ֨יךְ <WH349> How אֶֽעֱשֶׂ֜ה <WH6213> how then can I do הָרָעָ֤ה <WH7451> wickedness הַגְּדֹלָה֙ <WH1419> this great הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> likewise וְחָטָ֖אתִי <WH2398> and sin לֵֽאלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> angels

וַיְהִ֕י <WH1961> become כְּדַבְּרָ֥הּ <WH1696> And it came to pass as she spake אֶל־ <WH413> to יוֹסֵ֖ף <WH3130> to Joseph י֣וֹם ׀ <WH3117> day י֑וֹם <WH3117> by day וְלֹא־ <WH3808> did not שָׁמַ֥ע <WH8085> that he hearkened אֵלֶ֛יהָ <WH413> to her לִשְׁכַּ֥ב <WH7901> not unto her to lie אֶצְלָ֖הּ <WH681> by her לִהְי֥וֹת <WH1961> become עִמָּֽהּ׃ <WH5973> now it

וַיְהִי֙ <WH1961> happened כְּהַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> And it came to pass about this time הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> one וַיָּבֹ֥א <WH935> that [Joseph] went הַבַּ֖יְתָה <WH1004> into the house לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <WH6213> to do מְלַאכְתּ֑וֹ <WH4399> his business וְאֵ֨ין <WH369> else אִ֜ישׁ <WH376> of the men מֵאַנְשֵׁ֥י <WH376> of the men הַבַּ֛יִת <WH1004> of the house שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> was there בַּבָּֽיִת׃ <WH1004> inside

וַתִּתְפְּשֵׂ֧הוּ <WH8610> And she caught בְּבִגְד֛וֹ <WH899> him by his garment לֵאמֹ֖ר <WH559> saying שִׁכְבָ֣ה <WH7901> Lie עִמִּ֑י <WH5973> and he וַיַּעֲזֹ֤ב <WH5800> with me and he left בִּגְדוֹ֙ <WH899> his garment בְּיָדָ֔הּ <WH3027> in her hand וַיָּ֖נָס <WH5127> and fled וַיֵּצֵ֥א <WH3318> and got הַחֽוּצָה׃ <WH2351> him out

וַיְהִי֙ <WH1961> become כִּרְאוֹתָ֔הּ <WH7200> And it came to pass when she saw כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for עָזַ֥ב <WH5800> that he had left בִּגְד֖וֹ <WH899> his garment בְּיָדָ֑הּ <WH3027> in her hand וַיָּ֖נָס <WH5127> and was fled הַחֽוּצָה׃ <WH2351> forth

וַתִּקְרָ֞א <WH7121> That she called לְאַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH376> to the men בֵיתָ֗הּ <WH1004> of her house וַתֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> and spake לָהֶם֙ לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> unto them saying רְא֗וּ <WH7200> See הֵ֥בִיא <WH935> he hath brought in לָ֛נוּ אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> to the men עִבְרִ֖י <WH5680> A Hebrew לְצַ֣חֶק <WH6711> unto us to mock בָּ֑נוּ בָּ֤א <WH935> us he came in אֵלַי֙ <WH413> to לִשְׁכַּ֣ב <WH7901> unto me to lie עִמִּ֔י <WH5973> with וָאֶקְרָ֖א <WH7121> with me and I cried בְּק֥וֹל <WH6963> voice גָּדֽוֹל׃ <WH1419> with a loud

וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> become כְשָׁמְע֔וֹ <WH8085> And it came to pass when he heard כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הֲרִימֹ֥תִי <WH7311> that I lifted up קוֹלִ֖י <WH6963> my voice וָאֶקְרָ֑א <WH7121> and cried וַיַּעֲזֹ֤ב <WH5800> that he left בִּגְדוֹ֙ <WH899> his garment אֶצְלִ֔י <WH681> with me וַיָּ֖נָס <WH5127> and fled וַיֵּצֵ֥א <WH3318> and got him הַחֽוּצָה׃ <WH2351> out

וַתַּנַּ֥ח <WH3240> And she laid up בִּגְד֖וֹ <WH899> his garment אֶצְלָ֑הּ <WH681> by her עַד־ <WH5704> her until בּ֥וֹא <WH935> came אֲדֹנָ֖יו <WH113> until his lord אֶל־ <WH413> about בֵּיתֽוֹ׃ <WH1004> home

וַתְּדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> And she spake אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> about כַּדְּבָרִ֥ים <WH1697> unto him according to these words הָאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> these לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying בָּֽא־ <WH935> which thou hast brought אֵלַ֞י <WH413> about הָעֶ֧בֶד <WH5650> servant הָֽעִבְרִ֛י <WH5680> The Hebrew אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom הֵבֵ֥אתָ <WH935> unto us came in לָּ֖נוּ לְצַ֥חֶק <WH6711> unto me to mock בִּֽי׃

וַיְהִ֕י <WH1961> become כַּהֲרִימִ֥י <WH7311> And it came to pass as I lifted up קוֹלִ֖י <WH6963> my voice וָאֶקְרָ֑א <WH7121> and cried וַיַּעֲזֹ֥ב <WH5800> that he left בִּגְד֛וֹ <WH899> his garment אֶצְלִ֖י <WH681> with me וַיָּ֥נָס <WH5127> and fled הַחֽוּצָה׃ <WH2351> out

וַיְהִי֩ <WH1961> become כִשְׁמֹ֨עַ <WH8085> heard אֲדֹנָ֜יו <WH113> And it came to pass when his master אֶת־ <WH853> דִּבְרֵ֣י <WH1697> the words אִשְׁתּ֗וֹ <WH802> of his wife אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which דִּבְּרָ֤ה <WH1696> which she spake אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> to him לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> unto him saying כַּדְּבָרִ֣ים <WH1697> After this manner הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> another עָ֥שָׂהּ <WH6213> did לִ֖י עַבְדֶּ֑ךָ <WH5650> thy servant וַיִּ֖חַר <WH2734> was kindled אַפּֽוֹ׃ <WH639> to me that his wrath

וַיִּקַּח֩ <WH3947> took אֲדֹנֵ֨י <WH113> master יוֹסֵ֜ף <WH3130> And Joseph's אֹת֗וֹ <WH853> וַֽיִּתְּנֵ֙הוּ֙ <WH5414> him and put him אֶל־ <WH413> about בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> court הַסֹּ֔הַר <WH5470> prison מְק֕וֹם <WH4725> a place אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> where [אֲסוּרֵי כ] (אֲסִירֵ֥י <WH631> were confined ק) הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> where the king's אֲסוּרִ֑ים <WH631> [were] bound וַֽיְהִי־ <WH1961> become שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> was there בְּבֵ֥ית <WH1004> court הַסֹּֽהַר׃ <WH5470> prison

וַיְהִ֤י <WH1961> become יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> But the LORD אֶת־ <WH854> was with יוֹסֵ֔ף <WH3130> was with Joseph וַיֵּ֥ט <WH5186> and shewed אֵלָ֖יו <WH413> about חָ֑סֶד <WH2617> him mercy וַיִּתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> and gave חִנּ֔וֹ <WH2580> him favour בְּעֵינֵ֖י <WH5869> in the sight שַׂ֥ר <WH8269> of the keeper בֵּית־ <WH1004> court הַסֹּֽהַר׃ <WH5470> prison

וַיִּתֵּ֞ן <WH5414> committed שַׂ֤ר <WH8269> And the keeper בֵּית־ <WH1004> court הַסֹּ֙הַר֙ <WH5470> prison בְּיַד־ <WH3027> hand יוֹסֵ֔ף <WH3130> to Joseph's אֵ֚ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָ֣אֲסִירִ֔ם <WH615> all the prisoners אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> who בְּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> court הַסֹּ֑הַר <WH5470> prison וְאֵ֨ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> who עֹשִׂים֙ <WH6213> and whatsoever they did שָׁ֔ם <WH8033> there ה֖וּא <WH1931> he הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> become עֹשֶֽׂה׃ <WH6213> there he was the doer

אֵ֣ין ׀ <WH369> else שַׂ֣ר <WH8269> The keeper בֵּית־ <WH1004> court הַסֹּ֗הַר <WH5470> prison רֹאֶ֤ה <WH7200> looked אֶֽת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> to any מְא֙וּמָה֙ <WH3972> not to any thing בְּיָד֔וֹ <WH3027> [that was] under his hand בַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> because יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> because the LORD אִתּ֑וֹ <WH854> for וַֽאֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> and whatever ה֥וּא <WH1931> he עֹשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> was with him and [that] which he did יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD מַצְלִֽיחַ׃ <WH6743> made [it] to prosper ס
